TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UTF8Encoding extends System.Text.Encoding

summary.span: 代表 Unicode 字元的 UTF-8 編碼方式。

span.span: Represents a UTF-8 encoding of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼是將一組 Unicode 字元轉換成位元組序列的處理程序。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 解碼則是將編碼的位元組序列轉換成一組 Unicode 字元的程序。Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. Utf-8 是 Unicode 編碼，以一到四個位元組的序列表示每個字碼指標。UTF-8 is a Unicode encoding that represents each code point as a sequence of one to four bytes. 不同於 utf-16 和 UTF-32 編碼的 utf-8 編碼方式不需要"位元組序";編碼配置是不論處理器是位元組由大到小或由小到大相同。Unlike the UTF-16 and UTF-32 encodings, the UTF-8 encoding does not require "endianness"; the encoding scheme is the same regardless of whether the processor is big-endian or little-endian. 對應至 Windows 字碼頁 65001。 corresponds to the Windows code page 65001. 如需有關 UTFs 和所支援其他編碼，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的字元編碼](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information about the UTFs and other encodings supported by , see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 您可以具現化數種方式，根據是否要給它以提供位元組順序標記 (BOM) 以及是否要啟用錯誤偵測的物件。You can instantiate a object in a number of ways, depending on whether you want to it to provide a byte order mark (BOM) and whether you want to enable error detection. 下表列出建構函式和傳回的屬性物件。The following table lists the constructors and the property that return a object. |成員Member|BOMBOM|錯誤偵測Error detection| |------------|---------|---------------------| ||[是]Yes|無 （取代後援）No (Replacement fallback)| ||否No|無 （取代後援）No (Replacement fallback)| ||可設定Configurable|無 （取代後援）No (Replacement fallback)| ||可設定Configurable|可設定Configurable| 方法會判斷多少個位元組會導致一組 Unicode 字元的編碼方式和方法會執行實際的編碼方式。The method determines how many bytes result in encoding a set of Unicode characters, and the method performs the actual encoding. 同樣地，方法會判斷字元數會導致解碼的位元組序列，而和方法會執行實際的解碼。Likewise, the method determines how many characters result in decoding a sequence of bytes, and the and methods perform the actual decoding. 針對編碼器或解碼器能夠儲存狀態資訊編碼或解碼資料跨越多個區塊 （例如 1 百萬個字元的編碼中段 100,000 個字元的字串） 時，請使用和屬性，分別。For an encoder or decoder that is able to save state information when encoding or decoding data that spans multiple blocks (such as string of 1 million characters that is encoded in 100,000-character segments), use the and properties, respectively. （選擇性）物件所提供的位元組順序標記 (BOM)，也就是可以加在編碼程序產生的位元組資料流開頭的位元組陣列。Optionally, the object provides a byte order mark (BOM), which is an array of bytes that can be prefixed to the beginning of the byte stream that results from the encoding process. 如果以 utf-8 編碼的位元組資料流加位元組順序標記 (BOM)，它可協助判斷位元組順序的轉換格式或 UTF 解碼器。If a UTF-8 encoded byte stream is prefaced with a byte order mark (BOM), it helps the decoder determine the byte order and the transformation format or UTF. 不過請注意，Unicode 標準都不需要也不建議 BOM 的 utf-8 編碼資料流。Note, however, that the Unicode Standard neither requires nor recommends a BOM in UTF-8 encoded streams. 如需有關位元組順序和位元組順序標記的詳細資訊，請參閱 Unicode Standard > [Unicode 首頁](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123)。For more information on byte order and the byte order mark, see The Unicode Standard at the [Unicode home page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123). 如果編碼器設定為提供 BOM，可擷取呼叫方法; 否則方法會傳回空陣列。If the encoder is configured to provide a BOM, you can retrieve it by calling the method; otherwise, the method returns an empty array. 請注意，即使BOM 支援使用者設定物件，您必須將編碼的位元組資料流，視需要; 開頭 BOM 編碼方式的類別沒有這麼做會自動。Note that, even if a object is configured for BOM support, you must include the BOM at the beginning of the encoded byte stream as appropriate; the encoding methods of the class do not do this automatically. > [!NOTE] > 若要啟用錯誤偵測，並讓更安全的類別執行個體，您應該呼叫建構函式和 set`throwOnInvalidBytes`參數來`true`。To enable error detection and to make the class instance more secure, you should call the constructor and set the `throwOnInvalidBytes` parameter to `true`. 啟用錯誤偵測，偵測到無效的字元或位元組序列的方法會擲回例外狀況。With error detection enabled, a method that detects an invalid sequence of characters or bytes throws an exception. 錯誤偵測，會擲回任何例外狀況，而不正確的順序通常會遭到忽略。Without error detection, no exception is thrown, and the invalid sequence is generally ignored. > [!NOTE] > Utf-8 編碼物件的狀態時，不會保留該物件會序列化並使用不同的.NET Framework 版本。The state of a UTF-8 encoded object is not preserved if the object is serialized and deserialized using different .NET Framework versions. ## Examples 下列範例會使用編碼的 Unicode 字元字串，並將它們儲存在位元組陣列中的物件。The following example uses a object to encode a string of Unicode characters and store them in a byte array. Unicode 字串包含兩個字元，Pi (U + 03A0) 和標準差 (U + 03A3)，ASCII 字元範圍以外。The Unicode string includes two characters, Pi (U+03A0) and Sigma (U+03A3), that are outside the ASCII character range. 編碼的位元組陣列解碼回字串，Pi 和標準差的字元時仍會出現。When the encoded byte array is decoded back to a string, the Pi and Sigma characters are still present. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding Example/CPP/snippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding Example/CS/snippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding Example/VB/snippet.vb#1)] 下列範例會使用相同的字串與上述範例中，不同之處在於它將編碼的位元組寫入檔案，並使用位元組順序標記 (BOM) 的位元組資料流的前置詞。The following example uses the same string as the previous example, except that it writes the encoded bytes to a file and prefixes the byte stream with a byte order mark (BOM). 它接著會讀取檔案兩個不同的方式： 為文字檔，使用物件，並當作二進位檔案。It then reads the file in two different ways: as a text file by using a object; and as a binary file. 如您所預期，在兩種情況下是 BOM 包含在新讀取的字串。As you would expect, in neither case is the BOM included in the newly read string. [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding Example/CS/bom1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding Example/VB/bom1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立執行個體，不提供 Unicode 位元組順序標記，並不會擲回例外狀況時偵測到無效的編碼方式。This constructor creates an instance that does not provide a Unicode byte order mark and does not throw an exception when an invalid encoding is detected. > [!NOTE] > 基於安全性理由，建議您啟用錯誤偵測，藉由呼叫的建構函式`throwOnInvalidBytes`參數，並將其值設定為`true`。For security reasons, we recommend that you enable error detection by calling a constructor with a `throwOnInvalidBytes` parameter and setting its value to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新執行個體，並顯示其名稱。The following example creates a new instance and displays its name. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor1 Example/CPP/ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor1 Example/CS/ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor1 Example/VB/ctor.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式建立時偵測到無效的編碼方式時，不會擲回例外狀況的執行個體。This constructor creates an instance that does not throw an exception when an invalid encoding is detected. > [!NOTE] > 基於安全性理由，您應該藉由呼叫建構函式，其中包含啟用錯誤偵測`throwOnInvalidBytes`參數，並將其值設定為`true`。For security reasons, you should enable error detection by calling a constructor that includes a `throwOnInvalidBytes` parameter and setting its value to `true`. `encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier`參數可控制的操作方法。The `encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier` parameter controls the operation of the method. 如果`true`，方法會傳回位元組陣列，包含 Unicode 位元組順序標記 (BOM) 以 utf-8 格式。If `true`, the method returns a byte array containing the Unicode byte order mark (BOM) in UTF-8 format. 如果`false`，它會傳回長度為零的位元組陣列。If `false`, it returns a zero-length byte array. 不過，設定`encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier`要`true`不會造成為位元組陣列的開頭 BOM 的前置詞的方法也不會引起方法，以納入中的位元組計數 BOM 的位元組數目。However, setting `encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier` to `true` does not cause the method to prefix the BOM at the beginning of the byte array, nor does it cause the method to include the number of bytes in the BOM in the byte count. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新執行個體，並指定不應由發出的 Unicode 位元組順序標記前置詞方法。The following example creates a new instance and specifies that a Unicode byte order mark prefix should be emitted by the method. 方法接著會傳回 Unicode 位元組順序標記前置詞。The method then returns the Unicode byte order mark prefix. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor2 Example/CPP/ctor-boolean.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor2 Example/CS/ctor-boolean.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor2 Example/VB/ctor-boolean.vb#1)]

span.span: Parameters specify whether to provide a Unicode byte order mark and whether to throw an exception when an invalid encoding is detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier`參數可控制的操作方法。The `encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier` parameter controls the operation of the method. 如果`true`，方法會傳回位元組陣列，包含 Unicode 位元組順序標記 (BOM) 以 utf-8 格式。If `true`, the method returns a byte array containing the Unicode byte order mark (BOM) in UTF-8 format. 如果`false`，它會傳回長度為零的位元組陣列。If `false`, it returns a zero-length byte array. 不過，設定`encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier`要`true`不會造成為位元組陣列的開頭 BOM 的前置詞的方法也不會引起方法，以納入中的位元組計數 BOM 的位元組數目。However, setting `encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier` to `true` does not cause the method to prefix the BOM at the beginning of the byte array, nor does it cause the method to include the number of bytes in the BOM in the byte count. 如果`throwOnInvalidBytes`已`true`，偵測到無效的位元組序列的方法會擲回例外狀況。If `throwOnInvalidBytes` is `true`, a method that detects an invalid byte sequence throws an exception. 否則，方法不會擲回例外狀況，並忽略無效的序列。Otherwise, the method does not throw an exception, and the invalid sequence is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 基於安全性理由，您應該藉由呼叫建構函式，其中包含啟用錯誤偵測`throwOnInvalidBytes`參數並將該參數設定`true`。For security reasons, you should enable error detection by calling a constructor that includes a `throwOnInvalidBytes` parameter and setting that parameter to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新執行個體，指定方法應該不會發出 Unicode 位元組順序標記前置詞和偵測到無效的編碼方式時，應該擲回例外狀況。The following example creates a new instance, specifying that the method should not emit a Unicode byte order mark prefix, and an exception should be thrown when an invalid encoding is detected. 這個建構函式的行為會與預設值進行比較建構函式，不會擲回例外狀況時偵測到無效的編碼方式。The behavior of this constructor is compared to the default constructor, which does not throw an exception when an invalid encoding is detected. 這兩個執行個體中的資料列，也就是無效的字元序列編碼包含 （U + D801 和 U + D802） 的兩個高 surrogate 的字元陣列; 為高 surrogate 一律必須接著為低 surrogate。The two instances encode a character array that contains two high surrogates (U+D801 and U+D802) in a row, which is an invalid character sequence; a high surrogate should always be followed by a low surrogate. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor3 Example/CPP/ctor-boolean-boolean.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor3 Example/CS/ctor-boolean-boolean.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.ctor3 Example/VB/ctor-boolean-boolean.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個物件是否視為相等，如果所有下列條件成立：Two objects are considered equal if all of the following conditions are true: - 這兩個物件提供位元組順序標記，或兩者都不這麼做。Both objects provide the byte order mark, or both do not. - 這兩個物件都使用相同的編碼器後援。Both objects use the same encoder fallback. - 這兩個物件都使用相同的解碼器後援。Both objects use the same decoder fallback. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來測試是否目前物件是否等於其他物件。The following example uses the method to test whether the current object is equal to a different object. 四個和建立和比較物件比較的結果會顯示。Four objects are created and compared and the results of the comparisons are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的確切的陣列大小若要儲存產生的位元組，請呼叫方法。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, you call the method. 若要計算最大陣列大小，請呼叫方法。To calculate the maximum array size, you call the method. 方法通常會配置較少的記憶體，而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allocates less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 使用錯誤偵測的無效的序列會造成此方法會擲回例外狀況。With error detection, an invalid sequence causes this method to throw an exception. 錯誤偵測無效的序列會被忽略，而不會擲回任何例外狀況。Without error detection, invalid sequences are ignored, and no exception is thrown. 若要確保儲存為檔案或資料流時將編碼的位元組會正確解碼，您可以前置詞與前序編碼的位元組資料流。To ensure that the encoded bytes are decoded properly when they are saved as a file or as a stream, you can prefix a stream of encoded bytes with a preamble. 位元組資料流的開頭插入前序編碼 (例如在一連串的位元組寫入檔案的開頭) 是開發人員的責任，並在前序編碼的位元組數目不會反映在所傳回的值方法。Inserting the preamble at the beginning of a byte stream (such as at the beginning of a series of bytes to be written to a file) is the developer's responsibility, and the number of bytes in the preamble is not reflected in the value returned by the method. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫和方法來計算最大值與實際所需格式的字串編碼的位元組數目。The following example calls the and methods to calculate the maximum and actual number of bytes required to encode a string. 它也會顯示實際儲存位元組順序標記的位元組資料流所需的位元組數目。It also displays the actual number of bytes required to store a byte stream with a byte order mark. [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetByteCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.utf8encoding.getbytecount/cs/getbytecount1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetByteCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.utf8encoding.getbytecount/vb/getbytecount1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的確切的陣列大小方法來儲存產生的位元組，您呼叫方法。To calculate the exact array size required by the method to store the resulting bytes, you call the method. 若要計算最大陣列大小，請呼叫方法。To calculate the maximum array size, you call the method. 方法通常會配置較少的記憶體，而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allocates less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 使用錯誤偵測的無效的序列會造成此方法會擲回例外狀況。With error detection, an invalid sequence causes this method to throw an exception. 錯誤偵測無效的序列會被忽略，而不會擲回任何例外狀況。Without error detection, invalid sequences are ignored, and no exception is thrown. 若要確保儲存為檔案或資料流時將編碼的位元組會正確解碼，您可以前置詞與前序編碼的位元組資料流。To ensure that the encoded bytes are decoded properly when they are saved as a file or as a stream, you can prefix a stream of encoded bytes with a preamble. 位元組資料流的開頭插入前序編碼 (例如在一連串的位元組寫入檔案的開頭) 是開發人員的責任，並在前序編碼的位元組數目不會反映在所傳回的值方法。Inserting the preamble at the beginning of a byte stream (such as at the beginning of a series of bytes to be written to a file) is the developer's responsibility, and the number of bytes in the preamble is not reflected in the value returned by the method.

summary.span: 取得可以將以 UTF-8 編碼的位元組序列轉換成 Unicode 字元序列的解碼器。

span.span: Obtains a decoder that converts a UTF-8 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

returns.span: 可以將以 UTF-8 編碼的位元組序列轉換成 Unicode 字元序列的解碼器。

span.span: A decoder that converts a UTF-8 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將序列的位元組的區塊轉換成循序區塊中的字元，以類似的方式這個類別的方法。The method converts sequential blocks of bytes into sequential blocks of characters, in a manner similar to the method of this class. 不過，維護呼叫，因此它可以正確解碼位元組序列跨越區塊之間的狀態資訊。However, a maintains state information between calls so it can correctly decode byte sequences that span blocks. 也會保留尾端位元組的資料區塊的結尾，並在下一步 的解碼作業中使用尾端位元組。The also preserves trailing bytes at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing bytes in the next decoding operation. 因此，和適合用於網路傳輸和檔案作業，因為這些作業經常要處理的資料，而不是完整的資料流區塊。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream. 如果已啟用錯誤偵測，亦即`throwOnInvalidCharacters`建構函式的參數設定為`true`中, 也已啟用錯誤偵測這個方法所傳回。If error detection is enabled, that is, the `throwOnInvalidCharacters` parameter of the constructor is set to `true`, error detection is also enabled in the returned by this method. 如果已啟用錯誤偵測且遇到無效的序列，解碼器的狀態會是未定義，且必須停止處理。If error detection is enabled and an invalid sequence is encountered, the state of the decoder is undefined and processing must stop. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以取得 utf-8 解碼器。The following example uses the method to obtain a UTF-8 decoder. 解碼器會將位元組序列轉換成字元序列。The decoder converts a sequence of bytes into a sequence of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetDecoder Example/CPP/getdecoder-.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetDecoder Example/CS/getdecoder-.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetDecoder Example/VB/getdecoder-.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得可以將 Unicode 字元序列轉換成以 UTF-8 編碼的位元組序列的編碼器。

span.span: Obtains an encoder that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-8 encoded sequence of bytes.

returns.span: ，可以將 Unicode 字元序列轉換成以 UTF-8 編碼的位元組序列。

span.span: A that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-8 encoded sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將字元的循序區塊轉換成循序區塊中的位元組，以類似的方式方法。The method converts sequential blocks of characters into sequential blocks of bytes, in a manner similar to the method. 不過，維護呼叫，因此它可以正確編碼跨越區塊的字元序列之間的狀態資訊。However, a maintains state information between calls so it can correctly encode character sequences that span blocks. 也保留尾端字元的資料區塊的結尾，並在下一步 的編碼作業中使用尾端的字元。The also preserves trailing characters at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing characters in the next encoding operation. 比方說，資料區塊可能會以無對應的高 surrogate，結尾，而且下一個資料區塊可能會比對的低 surrogate。For example, a data block might end with an unmatched high surrogate, and the matching low surrogate might be in the next data block. 因此，和適合用於網路傳輸和檔案作業，因為這些作業經常要處理的資料，而不是完整的資料流區塊。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream. 如果已啟用錯誤偵測，亦即`throwOnInvalidCharacters`建構函式的參數設定為`true`中, 也已啟用錯誤偵測這個方法所傳回。If error detection is enabled, that is, the `throwOnInvalidCharacters` parameter of the constructor is set to `true`, error detection is also enabled in the returned by this method. 如果已啟用錯誤偵測且遇到無效的序列，編碼器的狀態會是未定義，且必須停止處理。If error detection is enabled and an invalid sequence is encountered, the state of the encoder is undefined and processing must stop. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以取得將字元序列轉換成 utf-8 編碼器編碼的位元組序列。The following example uses the method to obtain an encoder to convert a sequence of characters into a UTF-8 encoded sequence of bytes. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetEncoder Example/CPP/getencoder-.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetEncoder Example/CS/getencoder-.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetEncoder Example/VB/getencoder-.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的確切的陣列大小若要儲存產生的位元組，請呼叫方法。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, you call the method. 若要計算最大陣列大小，請呼叫方法。To calculate the maximum array size, you call the method. 方法通常會配置較少的記憶體，而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allocates less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 是最壞情況的數字，包括目前所選最壞的情況。 is a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected . 如果後援會選擇使用可能很大的字串、可以傳回較大的值。If a fallback is chosen with a potentially large string, can return large values. 在大部分情況下，這個方法會傳回對小型字串合理的數字。In most cases, this method returns reasonable numbers for small strings. 針對大型的字串，您可能選擇使用極大的緩衝區，少數的情況下，更合理的緩衝區已超出攔截錯誤。For large strings, you might have to choose between using very large buffers and catching errors in the rare case that a more reasonable buffer is exceeded. 您也可以在不同的方法使用，請考慮或。You might also want to consider a different approach using or . 比方說，通常需要英文和許多其他語言的文字只有一個的 utf-8 位元組來表示字元，但所傳回的數目就必須允許，要轉換的字串會完全字元組成，每個可能的原因需要四個位元組。For example, text in English and many other languages often needs only one UTF-8 byte to represent a character, but the number returned by has to allow for the possibility that the string to be converted will consist entirely of characters that each require four bytes. 沒有任何關聯。 has no relation to . 如果您的應用程式需要類似的函式，以搭配，它應該使用。If your application needs a similar function to use with , it should use . > [!NOTE] > `GetMaxByteCount(N)` 不一定是相同的值`N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`。`GetMaxByteCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法傳回的編碼指定的字元數所需的位元組數目上限。The following example uses the method to return the maximum number of bytes required to encode a specified number of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.utf8encoding.getmaxbytecount example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CPP/getmaxbytecount-int32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.utf8encoding.getmaxbytecount example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CS/getmaxbytecount-int32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.utf8encoding.getmaxbytecount example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/VB/getmaxbytecount-int32.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Function GetPreamble () As Byte()

override this.GetPreamble : unit -> byte[]

summary.span: 如果設定 編碼物件提供編碼方式，則會傳回以 UTF-8 格式編碼的 Unicode 位元組順序標記。

span.span: Returns a Unicode byte order mark encoded in UTF-8 format, if the encoding object is configured to supply one.

returns.span: 如果設定 編碼物件提供編碼方式，則為包含 Unicode 位元組順序標記的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array containing the Unicode byte order mark, if the encoding object is configured to supply one.

returns.span: 否則，這個方法會傳回長度為零的位元組陣列。

span.span: Otherwise, this method returns a zero-length byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件可以提供前序編碼，也就是可以加在編碼程序產生的位元組序列的位元組陣列。The object can provide a preamble, which is a byte array that can be prefixed to the sequence of bytes that result from the encoding process. 引用編碼的位元組序列的位元組順序標記 （字碼元素 U + FEFF） 有助於判斷位元組順序的轉換格式或 UTF 解碼器。Prefacing a sequence of encoded bytes with a byte order mark (code point U+FEFF) helps the decoder determine the byte order and the transformation format, or UTF. Unicode 位元組順序標記 (BOM) 序列化為 0xEF 0xBB 0xBF。The Unicode byte order mark (BOM) is serialized as 0xEF 0xBB 0xBF. 請注意 Unicode 標準都不需要也不建議使用 BOM 的 utf-8 編碼資料流。Note that the Unicode Standard neither requires nor recommends the use of a BOM for UTF-8 encoded streams. 您可以具現化物件，其方法會傳回有效的 BOM 如下：You can instantiate a object whose method returns a valid BOM in the following ways: - 藉由擷取所傳回的物件屬性。By retrieving the object returned by the property. - 藉由呼叫建構函式`encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier`參數並將設定其值設為`true`。By calling a constructor with a `encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier` parameter and setting its value set to `true`. 所有其他物件設定為傳回空陣列，而不是有效的 BOM。All other objects are configured to return an empty array rather than a valid BOM. BOM 提供幾乎已遺失的參考，其編碼的檔案編碼方式的特定識別，例如未標記或標記不當 web 資料或儲存時企業的隨機文字檔案沒有國際考量。The BOM provide nearly certain identification of an encoding for files that otherwise have lost a reference to their encoding, such as untagged or improperly tagged web data or random text files stored when a business did not have international concerns. 如果資料一致的方式適當地標記，就能避免通常使用者的問題。Often user problems might be avoided if data is consistently and properly tagged. 提供編碼類型的標準，BOM 是多餘的。For standards that provide an encoding type, a BOM is somewhat redundant. 不過，它可以用來傳送正確的編碼方式標頭的伺服器。However, it can be used to help a server send the correct encoding header. 或者，它可用來當做後援萬一編碼遺失時。Alternatively, it can be used as a fallback in case the encoding is otherwise lost. 有一些缺點，若要使用 BOM。There are some disadvantages to using a BOM. 比方說，了解如何限制使用 BOM 的資料庫欄位可以是很困難。For example, knowing how to limit the database fields that use a BOM can be difficult. 串連的檔案可以也會是問題，比方說，當檔案會合併，例如某種程度的不必要的字元可以得到中間的資料。Concatenation of files can be a problem also, for example, when files are merged in such a way that an unnecessary character can end up in the middle of data. 儘管幾個缺點，不過，BOM 是強烈建議使用。In spite of the few disadvantages, however, the use of a BOM is highly recommended. 如需有關位元組順序和位元組順序標記的詳細資訊，請參閱 Unicode Standard > [Unicode 首頁](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123)。For more information on byte order and the byte order mark, see The Unicode Standard at the [Unicode home page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123). > [!CAUTION] > 若要確保儲存為檔案或資料流時將編碼的位元組會正確解碼，您可以前置詞與前序編碼的位元組資料流的開頭。To ensure that the encoded bytes are decoded properly when they are saved as a file or as a stream, you can prefix the beginning of a stream of encoded bytes with a preamble. 請注意，方法不會不在前面加上 BOM 編碼的位元組序列; 開發人員的責任提供適當的位元組資料流的開頭 BOM。Note that the method does not prepend a BOM to a sequence of encoded bytes; supplying a BOM at the beginning of an appropriate byte stream is the developer's responsibility. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來傳回 Unicode 位元組順序以 utf-8 格式編碼的標記。The following example uses the method to return the Unicode byte order mark encoded in UTF-8 format. 請注意，預設建構函式不會提供前序編碼。Notice that the default constructor for does not provide a preamble. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetPreamble Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetPreamble Example/CPP/getpreamble-.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetPreamble Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetPreamble Example/CS/getpreamble-.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetPreamble Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetPreamble Example/VB/getpreamble-.vb#1)] 下列範例將兩個會具現化物件，藉由呼叫無參數的第一個建構函式，不會提供 BOM，且第二個呼叫建構函式及其`encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier`引數設定為`true`.The following example instantiates two objects, the first by calling the parameterless constructor, which does not provide a BOM, and the second by calling the constructor with its `encoderShouldEmitUTF8Identifier` argument set to `true`. 然後它會呼叫UF8 編碼的字串寫入之前，請先將 BOM 寫入至檔案的方法。It then calls the method to write the BOM to a file before writing a UF8-encoded string. 如主控台輸出範例所示，從第二個編碼器會將位元組儲存的檔案會有三個的多個位元組，比第一個。As the console output from the example shows, the file that saves the bytes from the second encoder has three more bytes than the first. [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetPreamble#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.utf8encoding.getpreamble/cs/getpreamble1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetPreamble#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.utf8encoding.getpreamble/vb/getpreamble1.vb#1)] 您也可以藉由比較檔案`fc`命令主控台視窗中，或者您可以檢查包含十六進位檢視模式的文字編輯器中的檔案。You can also compare the files by using the `fc` command in a console window, or you can inspect the files in a text editor that includes a Hex View mode. 請注意，當支援 utf-8 的編輯器中開啟檔案，BOM 會不會顯示。Note that when the file is opened in an editor that supports UTF-8, the BOM is not displayed.

summary.span: 將位元組陣列中的某一段位元組範圍解碼成字串。

span.span: Decodes a range of bytes from a byte array into a string.

returns.span: ，包含將指定之位元組序列解碼的結果。

span.span: A containing the results of decoding the specified sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用錯誤偵測的無效的序列會造成此方法會擲回例外狀況。With error detection, an invalid sequence causes this method to throw an exception. 錯誤偵測無效的序列會被忽略，而不會擲回任何例外狀況。Without error detection, invalid sequences are ignored, and no exception is thrown. 如果要解碼的位元組範圍包含位元組順序標記 (BOM)，而非 BOM 感知型別的方法所傳回的位元組陣列，這個方法所傳回的字元陣列中包含的字元 U + FFFE。If the range of bytes to be decoded includes the byte order mark (BOM) and the byte array was returned by a method of a non-BOM aware type, the character U+FFFE is included in the character array returned by this method. 您可以呼叫來移除方法。You can remove it by calling the method. 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可能僅適用於循序區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或如果資料量很大，它必須分割成較小的區塊，請使用或所提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. ## Examples 下列範例會藉由呼叫初始化陣列方法，以判斷完全多少個位元組所需編碼的字串，然後再將位元組順序標記 (BOM) 的大小。The following example initializes an array by calling the method to determine exactly how many bytes are required for an encoded string and then adding the size of the byte order mark (BOM). 此範例接著會呼叫方法，可儲存至的陣列，然後再呼叫 BOM儲存編碼的位元組陣列的方法。The example then calls the method to store the BOM to the array before calling the method to store the encoded bytes to the array. 此範例接著會呼叫方法來解碼的字串。The example then calls the method to decode the string. [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.utf8encoding.getstring/cs/getstring1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF8Encoding.GetString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.utf8encoding.getstring/vb/getstring1.vb#1)] 請注意，在此情況下已解碼的字串不同於原始的字串，因為其開頭為 U + FFFD 的 16 位元的位元組順序標記。Note that in this case the decoded string differs from the original string, since it begins with a 16-bit byte order mark U+FFFD. 這表示兩個字串將會比較結果不相等，而且，如果字串為輸出，BOM 會顯示為取代字元"？"。This means that the two strings will compare as unequal, and that if the string is output, the BOM will be displayed as the replacement character "?". 若要移除的字串開頭 BOM，您可以呼叫方法。To remove the BOM at the beginning of the string, you can call the method.
